entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 03:47 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
